text: Pen amjakek, takaw olap agɨlak, Helod kumek, ñɨne Akelaws tep ne ak dɨl gapman bɨnonɨm mɨdɨl, Judiya binɨb kɨlop kod mɨdeb agɨlak. Agelak nɨŋɨd, Josep ne Akelaws mɨdeb ak taydɨl man anɨb ak amnɨm agɨl pɨlɨkak ak pen, kɨnɨl wɨsɨn nɨgak, God nop agak, Judiya plopens ma adɨkɨd amnɨmɨn, Galili plopens amnɨmɨn agak. Agek, Josep kɨlop poŋɨd amɨl taun Nasalet, Galili plopens am yolɨgup. Am yolɨgup anɨb ak, bɨ God gos ñek agñeb okok gɨnɨgab agɨlak tek nep gak. Kɨli takaw anɨb ak tɨkɨl agɨlak, Nop bɨ Nasalet nɨb agɨnɨgabal agɨl tɨkɨlak.
